```{r}
dat <- read_csv("featurized_malaria_data.csv")
labs <- read_csv("malaria_data_labels.csv")
```

```{r}
full_dat <- cbind(dat, labs[,1])
colnames(full_dat)[colnames(full_dat)=="1.0"] <- "label"
write_csv(full_dat, "full_malaria.csv")
```
